text: 12|81|(melum, avarkalai nokki) â€˜â€˜ninkal (anaivarum) unkal tantaiyitam tirumpac cenru, enkal tantaiye! Unkal makan (punyamin) meyyakave tirutivittan. Unmaiyakave enkalukkut terintataiye tavira (veronrum) kuravillai. Maraivaka nataiperra (ikkariyat)til iruntu (avarai) patukattuk kolla enkalal mutiyamalaki vittatu enrum
